wikipedia_page.main: Allen Foster (c. 1887 – 8 August 1916) was an English professional football inside left, who made over 140 appearances in the Southern League for Reading. He also played in the Football League for Bristol City.

response: *Allen Foster (c. 1887–1916), Reading Football Club player in the pre–World War I era
*Allen Foster Cooper (1862–1917), Republican politician representing Pennsylvania
